links.text: Buy books and related materials for your school

framework.title: Books and related materials
framework.descr: Deals for curriculum materials including fiction and non-fiction books, ebooks, DVDs, CDs and education software.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- books
- e-books
- e-audiobooks
- educational software
- CDs
- DVDs

## Benefits ##
- discounts of over 40% on some titles

framework.title: Library resources
framework.descr: Includes the provision of books, e-books, journals/ periodicals, e-journals, audio books, audio summary, library discovery and associated services split into 4 lots with 12 suppliers. Curriculum books are also available via this deal.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- academic books from a range of publishers (early years to KS4 and higher education)
- professional books and publications
- learning aids
- e-books
- newspapers, journals and periodicals
- e-journals
- audio books
- audio summary
- library discovery tools and services including:
  - search functionality
  - database provision
  - Online Public Access Catalogue (OPAC)
  - web resources
  - publisher packages
  - catalogue records
  - electronic and print resources

## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- discounts against publishers’ list prices
- comprehensive range of resources

framework.title: Furniture
framework.descr: This is a multi-supplier, multi-lot solution which provides a compliant solution for the furniture across a variety of school settings.The deal is split into 3 lots: office, educational and residential/domestic furniture.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- office furniture
- educational furniture
- residential and domestic furniture

## Benefits ##
- select a supplier for projects less than £25,000 (this is called a direct award)
- no obligation design and consultancy service for large projects

framework.title: ICT solutions and supply network infrastructure
framework.descr: Deals for a range of networking equipment and support services.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- servers and associated equipment
- enterprise storage solutions
- data backup and archiving solutions
- networking equipment
- wireless network systems
- Local Area Networks (LAN) virtualisation
- digital infrastructure
- online and Cloud storage solutions
- network security systems
- separate maintenance, installation, and support services

 
## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- management support

framework.title: Multifunctional Devices, Managed Print and Content Services and Records and Information Management
framework.descr: Deal for all schools and publicly funded institutions to purchase photocopiers, printers and scanners (multi-functional devices, MFDs) at a nationally negotiated rate.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- photocopiers, printers and scanners (multi-functional devices, MFDs) at a nationally negotiated rate

## Benefits ##
- schools report savings of around 40%

framework.title: Legal services
framework.descr: Legal services includes: estates professional services, facilities management services, building materials, modular, academy conversion and post conversion.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- academy conversion and post-conversion
- commercial, contracts and procurement law
- human resources and employment law
- property and land law
- education and charity law
- construction and estates management
- corporate governance
- data protection and freedom of information
- health and safety
- intellectual property rights and licensing
- litigation and dispute resolution
- private finance initiatives (PFI)
- shared services
- student matters (including admissions, exclusions and safeguarding)

## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- free initial legal advice
- competitive pricing with discounts on market rates

framework.title: Specialist professional services from NEPRO
framework.descr: Specifically designed for the procurement of professional services by the public sector covering a range of spend areas, including training, construction, ICT and education consultancy. Extensive experience within the local authority and school sector.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
19 categories of spend including transformation, finance, ICT, HR. Also provides schools advisors help with:
- curriculum advice
- facilities management 
- health and wellbeing
- marketing
- organisational and change management
- safeguarding
- school management and improvement support


## Benefits ##
- choice of regional and national suppliers
- only pay when work is completed to your satisfaction
- neutral vendor managed service (suppliers are managed for you)
- direct award available for some purchases

framework.title: School Switch
framework.descr: A simple way to switch energy suppliers online. Get instant quotes based on your school’s energy needs.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- a simple way to switch energy suppliers online
- instant quotes based on your school’s energy needs


## Benefits ##
- no specialist knowledge needed
- transparent (see all supplier prices)
- dedicated helpdesk is available

framework.title: Electricity (half hourly, non-half hourly and unmetered)
framework.descr: Provision of electricity, including half hourly, non-half hourly and unmetered supply. Provides additional support and associated services including demand side response, energy storage, electric vehicle charging, energy efficiency surveys and power purchase agreements.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- half hourly, non-half hourly and unmetered electricity supply
- ancillary services including demand side response, energy storage, EV charging energy efficiency surveys and Power Purchase Agreements

## Benefits ##
- dedicated account managers
- a choice of flexible and fixed contracts

framework.title: Electricity supply and ancillary services (non-half hourly)
framework.descr: Electricity supply and additional services, such as automated meter reading (AMR), services to reduce consumption and energy supply from renewable sources.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- non-half hourly metered electricity supply
- ancillary services

## Benefits ##
- a customer service team to help you
- discounts in wholesale energy markets

framework.title: Firms mains gas
framework.descr: A framework agreement for firm mains gas supplied through the National Grid. Online account information and additional support and associated services also available.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- gas
- additional support and associated services

## Benefits ##
- fixed rate deal for those needing budget certainty
- range of tariff options including:
  - fixed
  - flexible
  - flex+ green
  - bespoke contracts

framework.title: National energy performance contracting
framework.descr: The RE:FIT framework streamlines the procurement process for energy services and helps retrofit energy efficiency and local energy generation measures to your buildings or estate, reducing annual energy expenditure and carbon emissions.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- streamlines procurement process for energy services
- helps retrofit energy efficiency and local energy generation measures to your buildings or estate, reducing annual energy expenditure and carbon emissions


## Benefits ##
- improves energy performance of your buildings
- reduces carbon emissions and achieves annual savings on energy
- guaranteed level of energy savings – offering a secure financial saving over period of agreement

framework.title: Water, wastewater and ancillary services
framework.descr: A single national deal covering water supply, waste water removal (sewerage) and ancillary services that reduce water consumption and make usage more efficient and supply more resilient.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- water supply
- sewerage
- services that reduce water use


## Benefits ##
- discount prices

links.text: Buy catering services for your school
Buy cleaning services for your school

framework.title: Facilities management (FM) marketplace
framework.descr: UK-wide facilities management (FM) services; includes building and grounds maintenance, cleaning, catering, security, helpdesk, horticultural, reception, and waste services.
framework.body:
## Offers ##

- maintenance services
- catering services
- cleaning services
- workplace FM services
- miscellaneous FM services
- reception services
- security services
- horticultural services
- waste services
- contract management
- contract mobilisation
- statutory obligations
- computer-aided facilities management (CAFM)
- helpdesk services
- management of billable works


## Benefits ##
- clear not-for-profit charges
- regular updates on purchases and prices to help you budget
- choice of regional and national suppliers

framework.title: Removal, relocation and additional services
framework.descr: Regional suppliers covering all aspects of removal and relocation services including: office and classroom equipment and specialised relocations (laboratories, art and IT equipment), overseas removals, crate hire and archiving.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
Regional suppliers covering all aspects of removal and relocation services including:
- overseas removals
- crate hire
- archiving
- office and classroom equipment and specialised relocations (laboratories, art and IT equipment)


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- contract management support (such as practical advice with specifications, quotations, contract award and management of suppliers)

framework.title: Construction consultancy services
framework.descr: Suppliers providing estates, facilities and capital consultancy services across a wide range of property specialisms.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- suppliers that provide estates, facilities and capital consultancy services across a range of property specialisms

## Benefits ##
- choice of regional and national suppliers
- flexible contract arrangements
- additional consultancy services

framework.title: Building cleaning services
framework.descr: Providers of building cleaning services including: janitorial services, periodic cleaning, high-level cleaning and window cleaning.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
Lets you procure fully-managed outsourced building cleaning services including:
- janitorial services
- deep / periodic cleaning
- high-level cleaning
- window cleaning


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- DBS-checked personnel
- expert support

framework.title: Audit services
framework.descr: Audit service deal tailored for academies and schools.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- internal audit
- external audit
- assurance
- audit-related services
- financial control services

## Benefits ##
- free quote tool

framework.title: Spend analysis and recovery services
framework.descr: Services to help schools identify and recover supplier overpayments, overcharges or missed discounts and rebates.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- retrospective audit and analysis of core spend and transactions
- identify and recover overpayments from suppliers

## Benefits ##
- no win, no fee
- minimal resource needed from schools

framework.title: Insurance for academies, free schools and similar institutions
framework.descr: Provision of commercial insurance for schools.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- insurance and insurance related services, designed primarily for use by academies, free schools and academy trusts


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- advice on insurance services not covered by DfE’s risk protection arrangement

framework.title: Leasing services
framework.descr: This framework agreement for leasing services offers a range of leases to members across the education sector, particularly schools, colleges and academies. Members can access 9 leasing suppliers across 3 separate lots, offering a range of leasing products for equipment, technology and vehicles.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- ICT equipment
- sports and gym equipment
- scientific and research equipment
- plant equipment
- medical equipment
- multi-functional devices (MFD) operating and finance
- commercial vehicles and cars
- furniture and infrastructure
- modular buildings
- solar PV
- LED lighting
- synthetic sports pitches
- engineering plant and machinery


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- large discounts on market prices

framework.title: Employee screening services
framework.descr: Comprehensive service covering all employee screening service requirements.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- right to work checks
- credit checks
- reference checks
- DVLA driving checks
- international fraud and sanction checks
- BS7858 and Baseline Personnel Security Standard (BPSS) checks
- Disclosure Barring Service (DBS) checks
- employment history checks (including gap verification)
- identity verification (including passport verification)
- professional and educational qualifications
- a range of value-added services including:
  - Financial Conduct Authority
  - MOT and insurance
  - Energy and Utility Skills Register
  - Health and Safety and Fraud and Abuse Control Information System (FACIS) checks


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- access to automated online DBS check system
- select a supplier for projects less than £25,000 (this is called a direct award)

framework.title: Hiring supply teachers and agency workers
framework.descr: Suppliers available for hiring of all temporary and fixed term teaching and non-teaching staff for schools, colleges or other educational establishments within the public sector such as an academy, trust, nursery, pupil referral unit, children centre or further education institution, across the UK. Independent schools (for-profit) are not able to access the deal.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- ability to find and hire a worker using an agency
- hire of a specific person using an agency (‘nominated worker’)
- a managed service provider who will take on your temporary staff needs
- breakdown of rates agencies charge
- downloadable shortlist of agencies based on your needs
- calculation of the maximum you could be charged to make your agency worker permanent


## Benefits ##
- transparent mark-ups
- avoid temp-to-perm fees
- completed background and safeguarding checks

framework.title: Software licenses and associated services for academies and schools
framework.descr: Software licenses and associated supporting services.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- software licenses and associated supporting services

## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- contract manager assistance and support

framework.title: ICT, cloud, support and related services (Think IT)
framework.descr: Educational cloud services specifically designed for the needs of schools, academies and other learning centres.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- Hardware such as PCs, laptops, tablets, servers, printers, multi-functional devices.
- Software such as Microsoft O365, Google, Adobe, cyber security, mobile device management, educational content, MIS and financial packages.
- Connectivity such as broadband, dedicated lines, 4G, 5G and satellite.
- Infrastructure such as wifi, cabling, wide area networks and network management.
- Cloud services, including Microsoft Azure, automated backup services, remote desktop, disaster recovery, VoIP systems.
- Mix of fully and partially managed services.
- IT Support, including staff training, onsite support technicians and remote helpdesk.
- Consultancy services, including cloud readiness assessment, review of technical infrastructure and existing contract reviews.

## Benefits ##
- Choose from over 100 suppliers, including Microsoft, Dell, HP, Cisco, SMART, Promethean and niche providers.
- Save time with quotes which are relevant to you, often within 24 hours.
- Save money with reduced pricing through national deals.
- Multiple quotes or direct awards.
- Better value through suppliers benchmarked on cost, quality and service.
- Free advice on cloud solutions, relevant suppliers, procurement regulations and tendering processes.

links.text: Buy ICT hardware for your school

framework.title: Desktop hardware
framework.descr: Agreement for the supply of a wide range of ICT equipment and supporting services.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- a range of ICT equipment and supporting services

## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- substantial savings on IT brands

framework.title: Multi-functional devices (MFD) and associated print services and supplies
framework.descr: Photocopiers, printers and scanners (multi-functional devices, MFDs) that includes all types of managed print services.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- managed print services
- free-of-charge print audits
- recycled technologies
- IT cloud services
- IT support services
- scanning and archiving services
- mailroom management and mailing services
- offset and specialist printing
- data storage, workflow and management solutions
- MFD and print consultancy
- specialist print services
- a full range of MFD, IT and office-related consumables


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- you can buy or lease
- a range of support and consultancy services
- large discounts on market prices

framework.title: Photocopiers, printers and scanners with toners included
framework.descr: Photocopiers, printers and scanners (multi-functional devices, MFDs) from a range of suppliers including Sharp, Konica, Annodata (Kyocera) and Ricoh.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
Photocopiers, printers and scanners (multi-functional devices, MFDs) from a range of suppliers including:
- Sharp
- Konica
- Annodata (Kyocera)
- Ricoh


## Benefits ##
- free quote tool
- A4 and A3 prints for the same price
- no minimum billing – all toners included

framework.title: Digital Marketplace (G-Cloud 11)
framework.descr: Cloud computing services covering hosting, software and cloud support.Choose and purchase cloud computing services from 3,500 suppliers covering infrastructure, platform, software and specialist cloud services.Direct Award available.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
- cloud computing services covering infrastructure, platform, software and specialist cloud services

## Benefits ##
- access to nearly 25,000 services and 3,500 suppliers
- scalable services which can be expanded or shrunk as demand requires
- rapid deployment
- much reduced costs and total cost of ownership compared to running your own data centre

framework.title: Risk Protection Arrangement
framework.descr: An alternative to commercial insurance for academies, underwritten by the government, opt in immediately or up to 12 months in advance.
framework.body:
## Offers ##
Cover for academies including:
- material damage
- business interruption
- employers’ liability 
- third party liability
- governors’ liability
- professional indemnity
- employee and third party dishonesty
- money
- personal accident
- United Kingdom travel
- overseas travel including winter sports
- legal expenses
- cultural assets

## Benefits ##
- you’re covered as soon as you complete the form
- membership is renewed automatically every year
- £20 per pupil or less until at least 31 August 2022
- free risk management advice, training and best practice guidance from [Willis Towers Watson](http://www.willis.com/)

framework.title: Interest-free loans to fund energy saving schemes
framework.descr: All maintained schools, academies, free schools and sixth form colleges can get interest-free loans to fund over 100 different technologies such as LED lighting, boiler replacements and insulation. Loans are designed to reduce your energy bills and have no upfront costs.
framework.body:
## Offers ##

- An interest-free loan.
- Use your loan to fund over 100 different technologies such as LED lighting, boiler replacements and insulation.
- Available to all maintained schools, academies, free schools and sixth form colleges.

## Benefits ##
- Reduce your energy bills.
- No upfront cost – the interest-free loan is repaid with the predicted energy savings.
- Reduce your carbon footprint.
- Repayments are recycled to fund other public sector projects.

options.hint: For schools and MATs with knowledge or experience of procurement (only need minimal guidance).

options.title: Schools focused
options.hint: Varying levels of support for schools and MATs with any level of knowledge or experience of procurement (including detailed end-to-end support).

question.err: Select which services you are looking for

question.err: Select which services you are looking for

question.err: Select which services you are looking for
